text: Urbain Braems (10 November 1933 – 9 September 2021) was a Belgian footballer and manager. He played for K.S.V. Sottegem, K.R.C. Mechelen, Club Brugge and Daring Club Bruxelles. He managed Cercle Brugge, Royal Antwerp, Anderlecht, Beveren, Lokeren, Standard de Liège, Panionios G.S.S. and Trabzonspor. Braems was born in Zottegem, Belgium. ==Honours== ===Manager=== Cercle Brugge *Belgian Second Division: 1970–71 Anderlecht *Belgian First Division: 1973–74 *Belgian Cup: 1974–75 Beveren *Belgian First Division: 1983–84 *Belgian Cup: 1977–78, 1982–83 *Belgian Supercup: 1984 Panionios *Balkans Cup runner-up: 1986 Trabzonspor *Turkish Cup: 1991–92 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian football managers Category:Belgian footballers
title: Urbain Braems
